Libel and slander
Denunciation (Criminal law)
metadata.title: Du registre des délibérations de la commune d'Amboise, a été extrait ce qui suit
metadata.creator: Amboise (France)
Amboise (France)
Moreau, officier municipal d'Amboise
Javelle
Vauquer-Lambert, F., printer
metadata.publisher: A Tours : Chez F. Vauquer-Lambert, imprimr. de la municipalité
metadata.description: Signed, p. 2: Moreau; signed, p. 4: Javelle, maire; Chambellan, Pic-Paris, Moreau, Seiller, Bouttet, Goujon, officiers-municipaux; & Boureau, secrétaire-greffier
"Aujourd'hui seize avril mil sept cent quatre-vingt-onze ..."--P. 1
Denounces the author of an article published in Vedette, ou, Précis de toutes les nouvelles du jour, which accuses the government and citizens of Amboise of harboring aristocratic tendencies
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
